introduction: Qutbul Madar jinhain Hazrat Syed Badiuddin Zinda Shah Madar (RA) ke naam se bhi jana jata hai, Sufi riwayat ki aik bohat muqaddas aur azeem shakhsiyat hain. Aap asal mein Syria se thay aur aap ki paidaish 856 AD mein shehar Halab (jo ab Aleppo ke naam se jana jata hai) mein hui. Baad mein aap ne Hindustan ki taraf hijrat ki jahan aap ne Madariyya Sufi silsila qaim kiya. Qutbul Madar ki official website par aap ki zindagi, taleemat aur aap ke qaim karda Sufi silsila ke hawale se mukammal maloomat mojood hai.
key-features: Website par mojood chand aham khusosiyat

sections.title: Urs-e-Sarkaar Syed Badiuddin Zinda Shah Madar
sections.description: Website par Hazrat Syed Badiuddin Zinda Shah Madar ke Urs (wisaal ki barsi) ki maloomat di gayi hai jo har saal 13, 14 aur 15 February ko manaya jata hai.

sections.description: Website par Hazrat Syed Badiuddin Zinda Shah Madar ki Dargah Shareef se mutalliq tafseeli maloomat faraham ki gayi hai.

sections.description: Yeh aik taleemi idara hai jahan zarooratmand talaba ko taleem di jati hai. Website ke zariye logon ko in talaba ki madad ke liye donation dene ki targheeb di jati hai.

sections.title: Mazar Shareef Chadar Poshi

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.description: Website par un afraad ke liye rabta maloomat mojood hai jo in rasoomat mein shirkat karna chahte hain ya taleemi idare ki madad karna chahte hain.

sections.description: Website par English, Urdu, Hindi aur Farsi zabanon mein mufeed kutub mojood hain.

articles.title: UNESCO ne Chamba ko Heritage City qarar diya
articles.description: Syrian Sufi buzurg Syed Badiuddin Ahmad Zinda Shah Madar ne Chamba ki roohani aur saqafati taraqqi mein bunyadi kirdar ada kiya. Aap ki paidaish 9th century mein Halab, Syria mein hui. Aap Hasani aur Hussaini Syed thay aur paidaish se hi ghair mamooli roohani sifaat ke haamil thay. Bayazeed Bustami jaisay azeem Sufi buzurgon se roohani taleem hasil karne ke baad aap ko Hindustan mein Sufism phailane ka hukum mila. 859 AD mein aap Hindustan tashreef laye aur Gujarat, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, Bengal, Kashmir aur Nepal tak safar kiya. Chamba mein aap ki karamaat ke sabab ilaqa qudrati aafaat aur buri quwaton se mehfooz raha. Aap ki barkat se Raja Sahil Verman ne Chamba ko darul hukoomat banaya. Madari Sufi riwayat ne Chamba ki saqafat par gehra asar chhoda. Aaj bhi Chamba mein Shah Madar ka Chilla aik aham roohani aur tareekhi markaz hai.

articles.title: Makanpur mein purani Khanqahi riwayat ka dilkash manzar
articles.description: Makanpur Shareef, jahan 818 Hijri mein Zinda Shah Madar ne qiyam farmaya, aaj bhi Madari Sufi riwayat ka zinda markaz hai. Sadiyon se yeh Khanqah Sajjadagi ki asal riwayat ko barqarar rakhe hue hai, khas tor par Urs ke mauqe par jo Jamadil Awwal mein hota hai. 16 aur 17 Jamadil Awwal ko aik munfarid riwayat ada ki jati hai jismein virasati Sajjada Nashin Takht-e-Sajjadagi par juloos farmate hain aur Qur’an Majeed ko aik kashti mein rakh kar pesh kiya jata hai. Yeh amal Rasool Allah ﷺ ki us taleem ki nishani hai jismein Ahl-e-Bait ko Hazrat Nuh (AS) ki kashti se tashbeeh di gayi hai. Tamam mushkilat ke bawajood Madari Sajjada Nashinon ki virasati silsila aaj bhi barqarar hai.

articles.title: Syed Badiuddin Ahmad Zinda Shah Madar ka mukhtasar ta’aruf
articles.description: Syed Badiuddin Ahmad Zinda Shah Madar jinhain Qutbul Madar aur Madar-e-Aalam bhi kaha jata hai, 1 Shawwal 242 Hijri (856 AD) ko Halab, Syria mein paida hue. Aap Nabi Kareem ﷺ ki nasal se Hasani aur Hussaini Syed thay. Bachpan se hi karamaat zahir hone lagi thin aur 14 saal ki umar mein zahiri aur batini uloom mein kamal hasil kar liya. Aap ko Sultan-ul-Arifeen Bayazeed Bustami se khilafat hasil hui aur baad mein Rasool Allah ﷺ aur Moula Ali se barah-e-raast roohani rehnumai mili. Allah ke hukum se aap Hindustan tashreef laye aur paanch sadiyon tak Islam ki tabligh, roohani markazon ka qiyam aur lakhon logon ki rehnumai farmate rahe. 1417 AD mein aap ka wisal Makanpur mein hua jahan aaj bhi aap ki Dargah roohani faiz ka markaz hai.

introduction.p1: Qutbul Madar wilayat ke maydan mein aisa roshan sooraj hain ke unki roshni ne musalmanon ke dilon, dimagh aur roohon ko Asia aur Europe mein manwar kar diya. Is ki roshni ne sirf Bar-e-Sagheer hi nahi balki Europe aur Africa ke Khanqahon aur Madaris ko bhi roshan kiya.
introduction.p2: Paanch sau chhiyanwe saal ki paakiza zindagi ke tamam pehluon ko bayan karna bohot mushkil hai. Ye mukhtasir bayan aik aajizana koshish hai taake unki mubarak sawanah ko tareekh mein darj kiya ja sake.

identity.title: Naam aur Alqabat
identity.titles: Shah Madar, Zinda Shah Madar, Shaikh Madar, Qutbul Madar, Madarul Alameen, Zinda Pir, Zinda Wali, Madar-e-Azam, Sar Giroh-e-Ahle Tabaqat, Pir Zinda Madar
identity.amongSufis: Sufiyon mein unhein Zindan-e-Suf aur Abdullah ke naam se yaad kiya jata hai.

birth.title: Paidaish
birth.content: Woh 1st Shawwal 242 Hijri ko Halab (Syria) mein Monday, Eid ke din paida hue. Unki mubarak paidaish ne unke walid Sayyed Ali Halabi ke ghar ko roshan kiya.

dreamsBeforeBirth.title: Paidaish se pehle khushkhabri
dreamsBeforeBirth.content: Unki walida Bibi Fatima Sania ne apne saahn mein ek roshan sooraj ko ubhrte dekha jo door door tak phail gaya. Unke walid ne khwab mein Prophet Muhammad ﷺ ko dekha jo unhein Badiuddin naam ke nek betay ki khushkhabri de rahe thay.

miraclesAtBirth.title: Paidaish ke waqt karamat
miraclesAtBirth.content: Paidaish ke lamhe mein charon taraf 'Allah' ki awaazain suni gayi. Nozaiyada foran sajda mein gaya aur Kalima parha.

genealogy.title: Muqaddas Nasab
genealogy.fatherSide: Walid ki taraf se unka nasab Imam Husain (RA) tak jata hai.
genealogy.motherSide: Walida ki taraf se unka nasab Imam Hasan (RA) tak jata hai.

education.title: Ibtidai Taleem
education.content: Char saal, char mahine aur char din ki umar mein unhon ne taleem shuru ki. Choudah saal ki umar tak unhon ne Quran, Hadith, Fiqh aur Islami Uloom mein mahart hasil kar li thi.

spiritualTraining.title: Rohani Tarbiyat aur Khilafat
spiritualTraining.content: Unhon ne Jafaria Husainia silsila mein khilafat hasil ki aur Sultanul Arifin Bayazidi Bustami ke zair-e-tarbiyat aala darja ke tasawwuf ke marahil mukammal kiye.

meetingProphet.title: Madina mein Hazoor ki Mojoodgi
meetingProphet.content: Hajj ke baad unhein Prophet Muhammad ﷺ ki mojoodgi mein rohani izzat mili aur unhein Hindustan mein Islam phailane aur dilon ko Tawheed ki roshni se manwar karne ka hukm diya gaya.

missionToIndia.title: Hindustan ka mission
missionToIndia.content: Iman ke sath unhon ne Bharat ki taraf safar shuru ki. Woh din bhar roza rakhte aur mukammal tor par Allah par bharosa karte thay.

journeyToIndia.title: Samundari Safar
journeyToIndia.content: Jahaz mein safar ke doran toofan se jahaz tabah ho gaya. Allah ke fazl se woh aik takht par mehfooz pohanche aur Gujarat pohanche.

arrivalKhambat.title: Khambat mein aagman (282 Hijri)
arrivalKhambat.content: Woh Gujarat ke Khambat pohanche aur wahan Islam phailane ka kaam shuru kiya. Hazrat Khizr ne unhein is muqaddas maqam par rohani rehnumai di.

maqam.title: Maqam-e-Samadiyat
maqam.content: Unhon ne Maqam-e-Samadiyat hasil ki. Unka chehra ilahi noor se roshan tha aur jo bhi unhein dekhta, Allah ko yaad karta aur sajda karta. Unhon ne apne chehra ko dhak kar rakha.
